   Miriam Valverde
   By Miriam Valverde June 18, 2020

Donald Trump falsely says Obama administration did not try to do police reforms

    If Your Time is short

     * Trump’s claim ignores key initiatives and priorities of the Obama
       administration.

The notion that the Obama administration didn’t try police reform because
   they didn’t know what to do is not accurate, said Kennedy, the research
   center director at John Jay College of Criminal Justice.
